page.title: 16Rosedale Estate
page.content: Rosedale Way has been here for about 12yrs.Most people have lived here for 5-9yrs.More than half of the people who now live here moved from London for reasons such as:cleaner air and a more rural environment.Everybody makes use of swimming pools,some make use of tennis courts and golf courses,most people use Tescos,Sainsbury and the Co-op for shopping. Some people wish to have nearer Youth,Sport/Leisure centres.Everybody uses Doctors and Dentist.People go to local clubs such as:Tescos Country Club,Social clubs,Fairly House FC.Sports clubs and Brownies/Guides.Most people travel by car but some walk and some take the bus.Just over half the people think there should be a free bus service for every main shop.
